articles.author: USA TODAY, Mike Snider, USA TODAY
articles.title: JPMorgan Chase is launching an investing app for traders next week – and it's free
articles.description: JPMorgan Chase next week will unveil You Invest, a new service that lets investors up to 100 free trades within a year. It's the latest move in a trend toward lower-priced investment trading options.

articles.author: USA TODAY, Adam Shell, USA TODAY
articles.title: Bull market, on eve of becoming longest in history for stocks, has room to run
articles.description: The rise in stock prices that began in March 2009 is set on Wednesday to become the longest bull market on record, and Wall Street pros say the rally has legs.

articles.author: Special to USA TODAY, Johnny C. Taylor, Jr., Special to USA TODAY
articles.title: Ask HR: Can a company require a college degree to advance to a management position?
articles.description: Ask HR: I want to move up in the company, but our policy requires supervisors to have a college degree. I don’t have the time or the money for college. Any suggestions on how I can move up and earn more money? Or am I stuck without a college degree?

articles.title: Report: Raiders rejecting trade inquiries about Khalil Mack
articles.description: It appears the Oakland Raiders aren’t even entertaining trade proposals for disgruntled outside linebacker Khalil Mack. According to Albert Breer of MMQB.com, the Raiders are turning down teams – none were specifically identified – calling about Mack’s potent…
